entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.DotNet.GenAPI.Tests/CSharpFileBuilderTests.cs in SDK repo test failures #74109
  • Cycle in required members #74108
  • Error/Warning messages on network share are not navigable #74105
  • Code Lens doesn't show references on Source Generated files #74104
  • Add compiler warning about CS file name not matching the class/interface contained within #74092

Closed

  • OverloadResolutionPriorityAttribute seemed no respected #74067
  • switch expression: Warning CS8524 issued although all cases have been covered #74076
  • type hints for collection expressions #72250
    Backlog
  • False positive CS4007 "Instance of type 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Buffer10<int>>' cannot be preserved across 'await' or 'yield' boundary" #74046
  • Record structs with InlineArray attribute compares only by the first value. #73504
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35020.20 #74094
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35020.110 #74093

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle early attribute required members cycle #74110
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test active statements in source generated files #74107
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Make sure task completes on exception path #74106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sign `VSSetup/Installer/Roslyn_Preview.zip` #74103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable some type test scenarios involving ref like type parameters #74102
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reduce time spent in ConflictResolver.Session.GetNodesOrTokensToCheckForConflicts #74101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #74099
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Add LSP notification for starting project initialization #74095
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Query for the COM service provider instead of direct cast #74100
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocations in AbstractSyntaxIndex<>.GetIndexAsync #74075
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add type hints for collection expressions #74051
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Align implementation with latest LDM decisions around invocations in presence of dynamic arguments. #74097
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Disallow `InlineArray` attribute on a record struct type. #74072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next

Updated

  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • On the fly docs - add telemetry regarding documentation comments #74088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test #74085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.11
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Remove warning for `yield return` in `lock` #74024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
